articles.title: Azealia Banks vows never to return to Australia - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: After backing out of her Brisbane show, the American rapper has wrapped up a “farewell tour” of Australia in a storm of controversy.
articles.content:
American rapper Azealia Banks cancelled her performance in Brisbane on Tuesday night and has vowed never to return to Australia.
